contest-event.event-date: April 2, 1945 D Midlands Area (Championship Section) Midlands Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Championship Liszt De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 18th Leicester Brass Band Festival, and also Midland Area Contest. Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £40 and shield, 3rd £25, 4th £15. 8 bands competed. Feb. 6, 2011, 7:11 p.m. Feb. 5, 2019, 10:03 a.m. 1 Creswell Colliery Band Harold Moss 2 Ransome Band David Aspinall 3 Sankey's Castle Works Cyril Yorath 4 City of Coventry Harry Heyes Unknown Result Foresters Brass Unknown Unknown Result Kirby Imperial Unknown Unknown Result Rushden Windmill Band Unknown Unknown Result Scunthorpe Borough British Legion Unknown
